name: Nabu Media
overview:
Nabu Media is a new media firm based in Dublin, Ireland. The Nabu Media team is pushing communication frontiers, using new technologies to help businesses harness their full potential.

The company created zoomvino, the number one internet communication platform connecting wineries with wine buyers worldwide.

Wine expertise, web technology and collaboration with the wine trade: zoomvino is the central point for contacts between wineries, buyers and wine tourists. zoomvino is available in English, French, Italian, Spanish, German and Chinese.

Tagged by location: wineries listed on zoomvino are in 50 countries, 250 regions and 1700 geographical denominations (appellations). The platform lists most commercially active wineries selling in bottle. zoomvino Buzz is a guide to the world’s wines - for those buying wines directly from wineries or planning a wine holiday.
